sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { GlobalVariables, Categories } from 'src/app/app.globals'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'home-panel', templateUrl: './home-panel.html', styleUrls: ['./home-panel.css'] }) export class HomePanelComponent { public categories: Categories[] = [] constructor(private http: HttpClient) { http.get(GlobalVariables.getAllCategoriesApiUrl).subscribe(data => { this.categories = data; }, error => console.log(error)); } onClickSubmit(data: { categoryId: any }) { alert(data.categoryID); } }
